title: Hey! Wake Up!
description: Happy morning, everyone!The perfect partner to Pajama Time! , Hey! Wake Up! is a good-morning book with the irrepressible language, the inimitable illustrations, the irresistible cast of characters only Sandra Boynton could create.Yawn.Stretch.Touch your toes.Shimmy shimmy shimmy,Wiggle your nose.Just watch out for the broccoli stew. (Ew.)
author: Sandra Boynton
